channel.title: First Review For Splinter Cell: Blacklist
channel.description:
Splinter Cell Blacklist went gold a few days ago. Here's the first review that I've seen for it.
[url='https://www.computerandvideogames.com/423776/review-splinter-cell-blacklist-delivers-great-stealth-book-ended-by-identity-breaking-flourishes/']https://www.computerandvideogames.com/423776/review-splinter-cell-blacklist-delivers-great-stealth-book-ended-by-identity-breaking-flourishes/[/url]
Enjoy.

item.title: First Review For Splinter Cell: Blacklist
item.dc:creator: k3nny1550
item.description:
Edge gave it a six. Ouch.

Sounds about right, honestly. No Ironside is a travesty, no matter how diverse the gameplay. It’s like removing David Hayter from the Metal Gear games.

…Shit, I’m gonna hate MGSV now, aren’t I?

Read full topic
item.source: First Review For Splinter Cell: Blacklist
